Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.logic.Card

  • public class Card
extends java.lang.Object

    The class Card is used to manage the Memory-Cards in the GUI

      • Card

        public Card(java.lang.String imgURL,
            int pairID,
            boolean onBoard)
        Parameters:
        imgURL - Used to reference the Image (.png) that the Card should display
        pairID - Every pair of cards has a specific pairID that is used to check if that correct pair was found
